txt.en: Collect hides from Orcs in Taur Drúadan ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dhûn-buri-Ghôb, a Wose drum maker, needs hides to repair some of his broken drums.
'Village safer now. Drums sound fine. You a good [placeholder].'\n\nThe Wose lets out a mighty laugh.
Some Orcs in Taur Drúadan may be carrying hides.\n\nYou should take hides from Orcs in Taur Drúadan.
Broken drums can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should fix some broken drums.
Dhûn-buri-Ghôb can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Dhûn-buri-Ghôb.
'Drums need new hides. Hides from Orcs on drums keep Orcs away when drum played. Understand?'
